N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-4.3 - Requirements for filing financial and statistical data

State Regulations
(a) Each provider shall complete the
financial reports in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, unless OPWDD specifies other principles. (b) Budget reports submitted in accordance
with this Subpart shall be certified for their fair representation of
anticipated expenditures by the provider's chief executive officer. (c) Cost reports prepared for providers shall
be certified for compliance with this section by: (1)
the chief executive officer of the
provider; and
(2)
a public
accountant who is: (i) licensed or
certified; (ii)
registered with the

New York State Education Department; (iii)
not on the staff of the
provider; (iv)
has no financial
interest in the provider; and
(v) is not a related party of the provider. (d) Cost reports shall include a statement of
the findings and opinion of the public accountant. (e) Incremental cost data shall also be
certified by the chief executive officer of the provider for compliance with
this section. Notes
